ICD-10-PCS Body Systems

Source: R/reference.R
systems.Rd

ICD-10-PCS Body Systems

Usage

systems(x = NULL)

Arguments

x

ICD-10-PCS body systems character, an alphanumeric code of length 1. If NULL (default), returns all 114 systems.

Value

a tibble

Examples

systems()
#> # A tibble: 114 × 5
#>    section axis  name        value label                                    
#>    <chr>   <chr> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                                    
#>  1 0       2     Body System 0     Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves
#>  2 0       2     Body System 1     Peripheral Nervous System                
#>  3 0       2     Body System 2     Heart and Great Vessels                  
#>  4 0       2     Body System 3     Upper Arteries                           
#>  5 0       2     Body System 4     Lower Arteries                           
#>  6 0       2     Body System 5     Upper Veins                              
#>  7 0       2     Body System 6     Lower Veins                              
#>  8 0       2     Body System 7     Lymphatic and Hemic Systems              
#>  9 0       2     Body System 8     Eye                                      
#> 10 0       2     Body System 9     Ear, Nose, Sinus                         
#> # ℹ 104 more rows

systems("0")
#> # A tibble: 31 × 5
#>    section axis  name        value label                                    
#>    <chr>   <chr> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                                    
#>  1 0       2     Body System 0     Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves
#>  2 0       2     Body System 1     Peripheral Nervous System                
#>  3 0       2     Body System 2     Heart and Great Vessels                  
#>  4 0       2     Body System 3     Upper Arteries                           
#>  5 0       2     Body System 4     Lower Arteries                           
#>  6 0       2     Body System 5     Upper Veins                              
#>  7 0       2     Body System 6     Lower Veins                              
#>  8 0       2     Body System 7     Lymphatic and Hemic Systems              
#>  9 0       2     Body System 8     Eye                                      
#> 10 0       2     Body System 9     Ear, Nose, Sinus                         
#> # ℹ 21 more rows

systems("2")
#> # A tibble: 2 × 5
#>   section axis  name        value label              
#>   <chr>   <chr> <chr>       <chr> <chr>              
#> 1 2       2     Body System W     Anatomical Regions 
#> 2 2       2     Body System Y     Anatomical Orifices

systems("X")
#> # A tibble: 12 × 5
#>    section axis  name        value label                                       
#>    <chr>   <chr> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                                       
#>  1 X       2     Body System 0     Nervous System                              
#>  2 X       2     Body System 2     Cardiovascular System                       
#>  3 X       2     Body System D     Gastrointestinal System                     
#>  4 X       2     Body System F     Hepatobiliary System and Pancreas           
#>  5 X       2     Body System H     Skin, Subcutaneous Tissue, Fascia and Breast
#>  6 X       2     Body System K     Muscles, Tendons, Bursae and Ligaments      
#>  7 X       2     Body System N     Bones                                       
#>  8 X       2     Body System R     Joints                                      
#>  9 X       2     Body System T     Urinary System                              
#> 10 X       2     Body System W     Anatomical Regions                          
#> 11 X       2     Body System X     Physiological Systems                       
#> 12 X       2     Body System Y     Extracorporeal
